Lyrics: Ecco il verno, ecco i venti!
Direct Translation: See translation at Choral Public Domain Library (LINK: http://www2.cpdl.org/wiki/index.php/Ecco_il_verno_(Hans_Brachrogge))
Poetic Translation: Here comes winter, here come the tempests!

Lyrics: e di neve coperta è omai la terra.
Poetic Translation: And already with snow the land is covered.
